_header: Sith the time I knew you first
Subjects: carols, amorous; lovers, addresses to beloved
_description: ‘Why soo vnkende’ — six couplets with three-line burden: ‘Why soo vnkende alas / Why soo vnkende to me / Soo to be kende to me’

BLRoyApp58.First Lines:
Syne the tyme I knew yow fyrstYou were my Ioy and my trustWhy
                    soo vnkende alaswhy so vnkende to meSoo to be kende to
                    me…
BLRoyApp58.Last Lines:
…Ye haue my hart ye haue my loveGode sende me youres that
                    syttyth above
BLRoyApp58.Editions:
Flügel,  Ewald. 
             “Liedersammlungen des XVI Jahrhunderts, Besonders aus der Zeit Heinrichs
                VIII.” 
             Anglia
         12 (1889): 225-72, 585-97: 261.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 305; 1977, 274.
